Issue.creator: ertalemdar
Issue.description: Cello Docs ( https://cello.readthedocs.io|https://cello.readthedocs.io/ ) have been the same for the past year and a half despite a lot of changes to the project. Instructions are disorganized (mismatches with the github repo readme's), redundant and have outdated requirements list (e.g still refers to any version of Docker 17+ as experimental). Docs related to the Ansible agent does not explain how to deploy custom chaincode, using different versions of Fabric etc.
